verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: On Monday] , [ARG0: Stephen Colbert] [V: mocked] [ARG1: President Donald Trump] [ARG2: for not attending the opening of the U.S. Embassy in Jerusalem] . He also took aim at Ivanka Trump and Jared Kushner ’s presence in Jerusalem .

On Monday , Stephen Colbert mocked [ARG0: President Donald Trump] for [ARGM-NEG: not] [V: attending] [ARG1: the opening of the U.S. Embassy in Jerusalem] . He also took aim at Ivanka Trump and Jared Kushner ’s presence in Jerusalem .

On Monday , Stephen Colbert mocked President Donald Trump for not attending the opening of the U.S. Embassy in Jerusalem . [ARG0: He] [ARGM-ADV: also] [V: took] [ARG1: aim] [ARG2: at Ivanka Trump and Jared Kushner ’s presence in Jerusalem] .
